sentences.sentence: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
sentences.translation: 没了爱，地球就是一座坟墓。

sentences.sentence: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
sentences.translation: 当你终于因为现实比梦境更美而无法入睡时，你便是陷入了爱情。

sentences.sentence: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
sentences.translation: 勇气，就是即使恐惧仍能继续坚持一分钟。

sentences.sentence: Youth is the freshness of the deep springs of life.
sentences.translation: 青春是生命的深泉在涌流。

sentences.sentence: Truly my favorite part is to see the kids jumping up and down and they just get so excited.
sentences.translation: 我最喜欢的就是看着孩子们兴奋地蹦蹦跳跳。
